Title: A Final Goodbye
Description:
Well, parents avenged, fish killed, more fish killed, biggest fish killed. 

Pretty good day.

I guess I should go burn stuff.
ObjectivesText: Help Alyza say goodbye in the Hungering Pool in Hallowfall.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return Alyza to the orphanage in Mereldar.
RewardText:
Thanks, $n. I'll make sure to put in a good word with General Steelstrike for you. I know her well. 

Well, I met her once. 

Well, I saw her in the street.

But I did think about talking to her, so it's the same thing really.
